landing.title: LocationIQ - Find the perfect location for your business with AI
landing.heroTitle: Find the perfect location for your business
landing.heroSubtitle: An intelligent platform that helps SMEs and entrepreneurs in Turkey discover the most profitable locations through data analysis when starting a new business
landing.whySubtitle: Enhance your location decisions with advanced data analysis and AI

precise.title: Precise Location Analysis
precise.description: Determine optimal locations using population density, competitor analysis, transportation networks, and demographic data.

businessSpecific.title: Business Type Specific
businessSpecific.description: Customized analysis criteria and scoring systems for pharmacies, bakeries, markets, cafes, and restaurants.

interactiveMap.title: Interactive Map
interactiveMap.description: Review results on visual maps and discover potential areas with heat maps.

instantResults.title: Instant Results
instantResults.description: Get detailed analysis results in seconds and make decisions without delay.

reliableData.title: Reliable Data
reliableData.description: Analysis results supported by current and verified data, providing trustworthy recommendations.

smeFocused.title: SME Focused
smeFocused.description: Analysis algorithms specifically designed for the needs of small and medium-sized enterprises.

landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Find the perfect location for your business in 3 simple steps

step1.title: Choose Business Type
step1.description: Select your business type such as pharmacy, bakery, market, cafe, or restaurant.

step2.title: Select Analysis Mode
step2.description: Compare specific locations or discover new opportunities.

step3.title: Review Results
step3.description: Determine the best location with detailed analysis reports and recommendations.

businessSelection.title: Business Type Selection - LocationIQ
businessSelection.stepSubtitle: Select your business type so we can provide you with the most suitable location analysis

pharmacy.title: Pharmacy
pharmacy.description: Healthcare-focused analysis. Priority given to hospital proximity, elderly population density, and transportation accessibility.

bakery.title: Bakery
bakery.description: Daily needs-focused analysis. Emphasis on residential density, pedestrian traffic, and competitive analysis.

market.title: Market
market.description: Retail-focused analysis. Population density, income level, and parking facilities are evaluated.

cafe.title: Cafe
cafe.description: Social space-focused analysis. Young population, student density, and social activity areas are prioritized.

restaurant.title: Restaurant
restaurant.description: Food service-focused analysis. Business center proximity, income level, and evening traffic are evaluated.

other.title: Other
other.description: More business types will be added soon...

businessSelection.helpText: If your business type is not listed, you can choose the closest one

modeSelection.title: Analysis Mode Selection - LocationIQ
modeSelection.stepSubtitle: Start your location research by selecting the analysis method that best suits your needs

comparison.title: Compare Specific Locations
comparison.subtitle: Analyze the potential of multiple locations in your mind and determine the best one
features: Detailed score analysis and comparison table
Competitor density and target audience compatibility
Pedestrian access and transportation convenience analysis

discovery.title: Discover New Opportunities
discovery.subtitle: Let us find and recommend the most suitable locations in your selected area
features: Analysis by province, district and neighborhood

modeSelection.helpText: If you have specific addresses, choose Mode 1, if you're looking for new opportunities, choose Mode 2

map.title: Map
map.info: Map information will be displayed here

generic.title: An Error Occurred
generic.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

network.title: Connection Error
network.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

api.title: Server Error
api.serverError: There's a problem with the server. Please try again later.
api.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
api.forbidden: You don't have permission for this action.
api.requestError: An error occurred while processing the request.

map.title: Map Error
map.message: A problem occurred while loading the map.

validation.queryTooShort: Search query must be at least 3 characters
validation.invalidBusinessType: Invalid business type. Must be one of: {types}
